name: Blessing of the River of Life

levels.description: Max HP <@ba.vup>+{max_hp:0%}</>, clears all <$ba.dt.element>Elemental Injury</> on self and gains a <$ba.epbarrier>Protective Barrier</> that absorbs up to <@ba.vup>{shield_value}</> Elemental Injury
